testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlDeviceInformationSubscription dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.9.1 [Need to Share Ramp Meter Inventory] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Publish Ramp Meter Inventory Information (NTRM 3.3.5.10.1.2}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N77R888_Publish_Ramp_Meter_Inventory_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N77R888_Publish_Ramp_Meter_Inventory_Information_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Subscribe to Ramp Meter Inventory Information (NTRM 3.3.5.10.1.3}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N77R889_Subscribe_to_Ramp_Meter_Inventory_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N77R889_Subscribe_to_Ramp_Meter_Inventory_Information_Parameter}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R380_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R380_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R381_Device_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R381_Device_Description_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Control Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R382_Device_Control_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R382_Device_Control_Type_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Controller Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R383_Controller_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R383_Controller_Description_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R384_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R384_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R385_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R385_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Name - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R386_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R386_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R387_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R387_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Name - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R388_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R388_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Direction - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R389_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R389_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R390_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R390_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference Version is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R391_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R391_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R392_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R392_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Uniform Resource Locator (URL) (DeviceURL) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R393_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported = ${TMDD_N77R393_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device URL Reference Medium is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R394_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R394_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported}

Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Inventory Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.16). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R395_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R395_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 21 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Lane Number - Ramp Meters is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.1.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R893_Lane_Number___Ramp_Meters_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R893_Lane_Number___Ramp_Meters_Supported}

Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Lane Type - Ramp Meters is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.1.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R894_Lane_Type___Ramp_Meters_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R894_Lane_Type___Ramp_Meters_Supported}

Step 23 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Associated Detectors Identifiers is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.1.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R895_Associated_Detectors_Identifiers_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R895_Associated_Detectors_Identifiers_Supported}

Step 24 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Absolute Minimum Metering Rate is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.1.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R896_Absolute_Minimum_Metering_Rate_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R896_Absolute_Minimum_Metering_Rate_Supported}

Step 25 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Absolute Maximum Metering Rate is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.1.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R897_Absolute_Maximum_Metering_Rate_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R897_Absolute_Maximum_Metering_Rate_Supported}

Step 26 CONFIGURE: Determine whether System Minimum Metering Rate is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.1.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R898_System_Minimum_Metering_Rate_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R898_System_Minimum_Metering_Rate_Supported}

Step 27 CONFIGURE: Determine whether System Maximum Metering Rate is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.1.5.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N77R899_System_Maximum_Metering_Rate_Supported = ${TMDD_N77R899_System_Maximum_Metering_Rate_Supported}
Step 28 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be received within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationsToReceive: ${PublicationsToReceive}
Step 29 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 30 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 31 CONFIGURE: Define the publication response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationResponseMessage: ${PublicationResponseMessage}
Step 32 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 33 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 34 CONFIGURE: Define the subscription message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionMessage: ${SubscriptionMessage}
Step 35 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 36 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}

Step 37 SUBSCRIPTION-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDeviceInformationSubscription RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED= SUBSCRIPTIONMESSAGE = SubscriptionMessage SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 38 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 38.1 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note:If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 38.1.1 PUBLICATION-EC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlRampMeterInventoryUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N77R888_Publish_Ramp_Meter_Inventory_Information_Parameter PUBLICATIONSTORECEIVE = PublicationsToReceive PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 38.1.2 IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 38.1.2.1 VERIFY that a device-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item
Step 38.1.2.2 VERIFY that a metered-lane-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.metered-inventory-list.metered-lane
Step 38.1.2.3 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 38.1.2.4 VERIFY that a device-id data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 38.1.2.5 VERIFY that a device-location data frame exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 38.1.2.6 VERIFY that a device-name data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 38.1.2.7 VERIFY that a rampMeterInventoryMsg message was received.
Step 38.1.2.8 VERIFY that a device-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item
Step 38.1.2.9 VERIFY that a metered-lane-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.metered-inventory-list.metered-lane
Step 38.1.2.10 VERIFY that a ramp-exit-roadway-name data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.metered-inventory-list.metered-lane
Step 38.1.2.11 IF TMDD_N77R380_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.11.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 38.1.2.12 IF TMDD_N77R381_Device_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.12.1 VERIFY that a device-description data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 38.1.2.13 IF TMDD_N77R382_Device_Control_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.13.1 VERIFY that a device-control-type data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 38.1.2.14 IF TMDD_N77R383_Controller_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.14.1 VERIFY that a controller-description data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 38.1.2.15 IF TMDD_N77R384_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.15.1 VERIFY that a network-id data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 38.1.2.16 IF TMDD_N77R385_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.16.1 VERIFY that a node-id data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 38.1.2.17 IF TMDD_N77R386_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.17.1 VERIFY that a node-name data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 38.1.2.18 IF TMDD_N77R387_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.18.1 VERIFY that a link-id data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 38.1.2.19 IF TMDD_N77R388_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.19.1 VERIFY that a link-name data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 38.1.2.20 IF TMDD_N77R389_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.20.1 VERIFY that a link-direction data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 38.1.2.21 IF TMDD_N77R390_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.21.1 VERIFY that a linear-reference data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 38.1.2.22 IF TMDD_N77R391_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.22.1 VERIFY that a linear-reference-version data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 38.1.2.23 IF TMDD_N77R392_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.23.1 VERIFY that a route-designator data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 38.1.2.24 IF TMDD_N77R393_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.24.1 VERIFY that a device-url data frame exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 38.1.2.25 IF TMDD_N77R394_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.25.1 VERIFY that an url-reference-medium data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header.device-url
Step 38.1.2.26 IF TMDD_N77R395_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.26.1 VERIFY that a last-update-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 38.1.2.27 IF TMDD_N77R893_Lane_Number___Ramp_Meters_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.27.1 VERIFY that a lane-number data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.metered-inventory-list.metered-lane
Step 38.1.2.28 IF TMDD_N77R894_Lane_Type___Ramp_Meters_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.28.1 VERIFY that a lane-type data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.metered-inventory-list.metered-lane
Step 38.1.2.29 IF TMDD_N77R895_Associated_Detectors_Identifiers_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.29.1 VERIFY that an associated-detectors data frame exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.metered-inventory-list.metered-lane
Step 38.1.2.30 IF TMDD_N77R896_Absolute_Minimum_Metering_Rate_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 38.1.2.30.1 VERIFY that an absolute-minimum-metering-rate data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.metered-inventory-list.metered-lane
Step 38.1.2.31 IF TMDD_N77R897_Absolute_Maximum_Metering_Rate_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 38.1.2.31.1 VERIFY that an absolute-maximum-metering-rate data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.metered-inventory-list.metered-lane
Step 38.1.2.32 IF TMDD_N77R898_System_Minimum_Metering_Rate_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.32.1 VERIFY that a system-minimum-metering-rate data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.metered-inventory-list.metered-lane
Step 38.1.2.33 IF TMDD_N77R899_System_Maximum_Metering_Rate_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 38.1.2.33.1 VERIFY that a system-maximum-metering-rate data element exists within each instance of data frame rampMeterInventoryMsg.ramp-meter-inventory-item.metered-inventory-list.metered-lane
Step 38.1.2.34 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 38.1.2.35 CONFIGURE: Set CONTENTVERIFIED to True

Step 38.1.2.36 POSTCONDITION: PUBLICATION-EC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlRampMeterInventoryUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N77R888_Publish_Ramp_Meter_Inventory_Information_Parameter CONTENTVERIFIED = CONTENTVERIFIED PUBLICATIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = PublicationResponseMessage

Step 39 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 39.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 39.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 39.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 39.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 39.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 39.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to SubscriptionErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 39.7 IF TMDD_N77R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 39.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 40 EXIT
